subject: Re: Lina Onboarding
body:
Thanks for the copy, Catalina. I so appreciate the work you're doing!
Mil gracias!
Nicole Barile
 
(She/Her)

From:
 Catalina De Sanctis <c.desanctis@lcwmail.com>
Sent:
 Monday, February 17, 2025 10:28 PM
To:
 Jorgelina Venturi <j.venturi@lcwmail.com>
Cc:
 Nicole Barile <n.barile@lcwmail.com>
Subject:
 Lina Onboarding
 
 
Hello Lina, 
Here I attach the word file of the things we will be working together.
I already sent you an invite to Trados Team.
You should have received an email, just click forget password and create a new one.
When you have time, you can start overviewing the files I mention here.
Also, please book if possible these meetings:
Tuesday 11.30am est Diligent
Wednesday 11am est Melody Maravillas 
MMaravillas@csjp.org
 
If you don’t have any of the links please let me know.
 
See you soon!
Best,
CDS
 
 
Catalina De Sanctis
Translation Specialist
LCW

subject: RE: Congrats Chuck on 5 years at LCW!
body:
A solid handshake of years to celebrate. Thank you, Chuck, for guiding the team through the changing landscape as our CEO. We have indeed been through a lot together. We are grateful for you.
 
 
Alisa Kolodizner 
(She/Her)
CSMO and Managing Partner
LCW
Email: 
a.kolodizner@lcwmail.com
Office: +1.773.888.9355 [CDT]
Mobile: +1.773.430.3534

From:
 Chuck Adams <c.adams@lcwmail.com> 
Sent:
 Friday, February 14, 2025 3:48 PM
To:
 Nicole Barile <n.barile@lcwmail.com>; Rebecca Parrilla <r.parrilla@lcwmail.com>; Alisa Kolodizner <a.kolodizner@lcwmail.com>; Andrea Wicks Bowles <a.wicksbowles@lcwmail.com>; Keri Luo <k.luo@lcwmail.com>; Arvinder Kaur <a.kaur@lcwmail.com>; Jorgelina Venturi <j.venturi@lcwmail.com>; Kaitlin Nonweiler <k.nonweiler@lcwmail.com>; Juri Mansour <j.mansour@lcwmail.com>; Catalina De Sanctis <c.desanctis@lcwmail.com>
Subject:
 RE: Congrats Chuck on 5 years at LCW!
 
Hahaha…
 
Thank you, Nicole. I had actually forgotten all about this.
I appreciate you noting the date. We’ve all been through a lot together. I am fortunate to have worked with some incredible professionals at this company. You all mean a lot to me.
 
Feeling blessed.
 
Chuck
 
 
Chuck Adams
 
(He/Him)
Chief Executive Officer
LCW

Subject:
 Congrats Chuck on 5 years at LCW!
 
I know...a lot of emails today - but it's been a busy day! 
🙂
 
Feb.16 marks Chuck's 5-year work anniversary at LCW. 
In the past half-decade, Chuck has guided LCW (and us) with wisdom, vision, and an impressive vocabulary that keeps us all reaching for a dictionary. His strategic thinking, dedication, and ability to inspire have made a lasting impact on our team and the work we do.
Please join us in congratulating Chuck on this milestone! Congrats Chuck! 
🎉
Cheers,
Nicole
 
Nicole Barile
 
(She/Her)
Chief Operating Officer
LCW
